page.title: 15Starting my day at School.
page.content: I arrived at 8.45am. and went into my classroom to hang up my coat.I am a boy and I am ten years old.My teacher was in the classroom getting some books out. I said "Good morning", and went out into the playground.I met some friends and we carried on our game of marbles from yesterday. Last week I won 34 marbles including 4 King Dobs.After that I had just enough time for one go at British Bulldog before the bell rang. Time to go in. I walked into the classroom and sat down at my table. I was about to start some writing that I had not finished yesterday when my friend reminded me that this morning it was "Radio Assembly" time to go into the hall. We were going to sing some hymns, listen to a story and say a prayer. My day was about to start.
